articles.author: Bianca Vázquez Toness, Ed White
articles.title: Americans mark Juneteenth with parties, events, quiet reflection on end of slavery - The Associated Press
articles.description: Detroit (AP) — Americans across the country this weekend celebrated Juneteenth, marking the relatively new national holiday  with cookouts, parades and other gatherings as they commemorated the end of slavery after the Civil War.
articles.content: Detroit (AP) Americans across the country this weekend celebrated Juneteenth, marking the relatively new national holiday with cookouts, parades and other gatherings as they commemorated the end of s… [+4745 chars]

articles.title: ISI’s hate toolkit unveiled: Twitter trends, protest rallies, and posters planned to disrupt PM Modi’s US visit - OpIndia
articles.description: Intelligence sources indicate that the ISI has been operating actively in America over the past few days with the aim of thwarting Prime Minister Modi's visit
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to embark on a three-day tour to the United States starting Tuesday. During his visit, PM Modi will participate in numerous programs. However, recent reports… [+4515 chars]
